content.rendered:
In collaboration with the WSWHE BOCES, our district will offer after-school enrichment opportunities including SPAC Arts Discovery, Science Discovery at The Children’s Museum, and STEAM Academy at the Myers Education Center.

Click here to view the information flyer with courses and registration dates.

Registration may be completed online. For additional information, please feel reach out to us at giftedresources@wswheboces.org or 518-581-3585.
